Introduction to pepliner

Claire D. McWhite and Nicolas Gort Freitas

2018-05-04

Source: vignettes/introduction.Rmd
introduction.Rmd

#Introduction

We had a need for tools to visualize the elution of peptides or proteins across fractions.

Basic usage

library(cowplot)
## Warning: package 'cowplot' was built under R version 3.4.3
## Loading required package: ggplot2
